title: BENNINGTON 3-PRONG 3.5MM, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE SILVER RIVIÈRE NECKLACE
description:
NEW STONE SIZE: 3.5MM
Our 3-prong rivière in a new, daintier 3.5MM size. The Bennington 3.5MM Rivière is crafted with lab-grown white sapphires in a minimal 3-prong sterling silver setting.
details:
